title: Can Amy Fake Her Home Address To Get Her Kids Into A New School? + Bobby Gets Upset During ‘Hot Guys’ Draft + Lunchbox Denied A Lyft Ride
itunes:title: Can Amy Fake Her Home Address To Get Her Kids Into A New School? + Bobby Gets Upset During ‘Hot Guys’ Draft + Lunchbox Denied A Lyft Ride
description:
Amy was looking into moving into a new house to get her kids into a new school. She was wondering if she could use her dad’s address in order to enroll them into a new school district. We do our Hot Guys Draft and one of the show’s picks makes Bobby upset. Also, why Lunchbox was denied a Lyft ride because of something he was wearing.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
